price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߡߣߐ߬ߓߏ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߓߊ߬؟ ߥߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߬ ߛߋߓߊ߯ߓߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
